title: Global impact of war in Ukraine on food, energy and finance systems - UNCTAD
content: Global impact of war in Ukraine on food, energy and finance systems  UNCTAD
description: On 14 March 2022, UN Secretary-General Ant√≥nio Guterres announced the establishment of a Global Crisis Response Group on Food, Energy and Finance (GCRG) to coordinate the global response to the widespread impacts of the war in Ukraine. The GCRG will ensure high-level political leadership to get ahead of the immense inter-connected challenges of food security, energy and financing, and put in place a coordinated global response to the ongoing crises.
